participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

macv_q2.Description: Parents should teach their children that the family always comes first. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q3.Description: Children should be taught that it is their duty to care for their parents when their parents get old. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q4.Description: Children should always do things to make their parents happy. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q7.Description: Family provides a sense of security because they will always be there for you. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q8.Description: If a relative is having a hard time financially, one should help them out if possible. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q9.Description: When it comes to important decisions, the family should ask for advice from close relatives. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q12.Description: It is always important to be united as a family | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q13.Description: A person should share their home with relatives if they need a place to stay | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q16.Description: It is important to have close relationships with aunts/uncles, grandparents, and cousins. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q17.Description: Older kids should take care of and be role models for their younger brothers and sisters. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q18.Description: Children should be taught to always be good because they represent the family. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q21.Description: Holidays and celebrations are important because the whole family comes together. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q22.Description: Parents should be willing to make great sacrifices to make sure their children have a better life. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q23.Description: A person should always think about their family when making important decisions. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q26.Description: It is important for family members to show their love and affection to one another. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q27.Description: It is important to work hard and do one's best because this work reflects on the family. | 1=Not at All; 2=A Little; 3=Somewhat; 4=Very Much; 5=Completely

macv_q20.Description: It is important to thank God or Higher Power(s) every day for all one has. | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_q24.Description: Parents should encourage children to solve their own problems. | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_q25.Description: It is important to follow the Word of God or Higher Power(s). | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_q28.Description: Religion should be an important part of one's life. | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_q5.Description: People should learn how to take care of themselves and not depend on others. | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_q6.Description: God or Higher Power(s) is first; family is second. | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_comprehend.Description: Did youth meet comprehension criteria? | 1= Yes; 0= No   ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1' and [sched_delay] = '7') OR ([event-name] = '4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1' AND [sched_delay] = '7')

macv_q1.Description: One's belief in God or Higher Power(s) gives inner strength and meaning to life. | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_q10.Description: The most important thing parents can teach their children is to be independent from others. | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_q11.Description: Parents should teach their children how to pray. | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_q14.Description: As children get older their parents should allow them to make their own decisions | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_q15.Description: If everything is taken away | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_q19.Description: When there are problems in life | 1=Not at All ; 2=A Little ; 3=Somewhat ; 4=Very Much ; 5=Completely  ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

macv_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self-Administered ; 3=Combination ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')
